values: Geoff Shepard: Watergate Was A Scam (And Now They're Scamming Trump)

Former Nixon White House staffer Geoff Shepard has uncovered new evidence that Watergate was a deep state coup, and they are using the same playbook on Trump.

(00:51) Who Is Geoff Shepard?
(02:22) What Was Watergate?
(12:07) The CIA’s Involvement in Watergate
(22:13) The Break-in
(42:11) Unanswered Questions About the Break-in
(52:10) The Core Criminals of Watergate
(1:01:14) The Press’s Role in Watergate
(1:16:39) Political Persecution of Richard Nixon
